data_table.description: This subject phenotype table includes subject age, gender, race, BMI, affection status for asthma, smoking status, hospitalization due to asthma, steroid treatment, bronchodilator response after treatment, NO2 and PM25 air pollution measurement in lifetime average.

variable.name: BMI
variable.description: Body Mass index calculated from Height and Weight

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case or Control status for asthma

variable.name: SMOKE_CURRENT
variable.description: Does participant currently smoke at least 1 cig per day?

variable.name: ASTHMA_HOSP_12MO
variable.description: In the last 12 months, has participant been hospitalized because of asthma?

variable.name: STEROID_12MO
variable.description: In the last 12 months, has participant been prescribed oral steroids (such as prednisone pills or prelone liquid) to help control asthma?

variable.name: deltaFEV1
variable.description: Bronchodilator response after 4 puffs of Proventil HFA Albuterol

variable.name: no2_lifetime
variable.description: No2 Air Pollution measurement lifetime average

variable.name: pm25_lifetime
variable.description: Pm25 Air Pollution measurement lifetime average
